column1: This is a staple on every Christmas list from my wife and this bottle usually gets her through a year. Anything smaller will run out well before then. She loves the scent and that's what matters(something I know she will like under the tree)!

This is a fake. I have used Beautiful for 25 yearend it is the only perfume I use. I saw it on Amazon and was so excited to get it t a cheaper price than Macy's. I developed a terrible rash on my neck and hand. I just went out to buy one at Macy's . It is made in the USA. The one I purchased through Amazon is made is Switzerland. Go online and it will tell you that it is fake it is says it is made in Switzerland. I now have a prescription to take care of the rash and dry spots on my neck. UUGH!
Like one other review...this is not the same scent it was when it first came out years ago.  I'm disappointed with it.  The scent quickly goes.
The perfect smell. floral but rich and balanced with plenty of bottom notes to give it some weight, and sophistication in its presentation.

This product did not smell like the Beautiful  I got from Macy's, not at all. Very disappointed this was my favorite perfume, this bottle of perfume I received had a awful smell.  Too expensive not to like. Wasted my money. Would not have given it any stars but I did not have the option.
This was a Christmas gift and my sister was thrilled to get it.  It is her favorite perfume.  What a great deal on this, it will last a long time!  Smells great!!!!!!

My Mom and I both strongly enjoy this fragrance !!. I could write a long paragraph on all the reasons that we think Beautiful is perfectly named, however for time sake... Beautiful is a 5+ in our opinion.
I gave this perfume to my wife for her birthday present.  We both love it.  Thank you to Estee Lauder and amazon for carrying it in stock.
Was purchased as a gift - receiver was very happy

No the perfume smells old and I need to send it back. It cost too much to be a waste. I love the fragrance and I would stop to smell when I would see it on display on the stores. I received the product already opened in a brown box. I'm very disappointed.

This fragrance is amazing! It has the character of a very sophisticated successful career woman who knows how to get what she wants.  This is a rich and heavy warm floral with a classic touch that just a few sprays will  last through the day and until the next morning.

I have used Beautiful for about  25 years and even though I haven't opened this bottle yet I hope in will  meet my expectations.  Recently some of the bottles I have purchased have had no smell at all.  After reading your purchasers coments about how good it smelled I decided to order from your company.
Fantastic, the REAL Thing, Beautiful is my favoirte Estee Lauder Fragrance finally at an affordable price. Thank you from the women of the world!
my wife thinks i buy this for her but in reality i buy it for me. i love the aroma which is a win all the way around. i never let her run out.
Been wearing this for years. Love it!!

LOVE this scent. I always get compliments when I where this. I do believe everyone has different scents that work for their own body chemistry however this scent is exactly as it's namesake BEAUTIFUL. Also very good price for the bottle size too.

So disappointed this is not the fragrance I was expecting and that I cannot return it.  I have only purchased this from Amazon so have no idea what the "Original" smells like or how long it lasts but this is not the same as the fragrance I have grown to love.  I had purchased a 1.0 fl oz bottle from Amazon and that one had a lasting "shower fresh" scent that was enjoyable all day.  This one has a chemical scent that lasts only a few hours.  Live and learn I guess.  Now I have to decide if I should take a chance on the product I purchased before.  Maybe I should just go to Macy's.

I'm not sure this is the real thing.  Even though it's a "spray" it still doesn't last long and you have to use a lot of it.  It says 2.5 oz on the box, but clearly it's much more than that.  Would love to have this tested.  Very disappointed since I've used the perfume for years and should have just ordered that.

This product is trash. My mother has used this scent for over 30 years and I ordered her a bottle thinking I'd get it cheaper for her. Like the other bad reviews, it was made in Switzerland...not the U.S.A. like it should have been and smells like chemicals. Trash! And she unknowingly, emptied it into her perfume atomizers and cannot return. SOOO MADD Wouldn't have given it ANY stars if I'd had that option! Get rid of this vendor, AMAZON
Love Beautiful. Many, Many compliments. Has a majestic fragrance.Beautiful.
Wife loves it!
Love the smell of this fragrance. It is my new favorite.
This is the real thing in perfect condition!  I won't order it anywhere else from now on!
This is exactly what she asked for!
The best, in my opinion of all perfumes
The product was what I expected & arrived extremely fast.
Wifey was very happy!!
